name: Goal Zero Boulder 50 Solar Panel
description: Upgrade your road trip rig with a rooftop panel. This large rigid panel works for stationary set-ups, like bolted to your van or used for off-grid power at a cabin or basecamp.Charges Goal Zero Yeti, Sherpa and similar powerbank systems.Charge times range from 3-4 hours (Sherpa 50 v2) to 16-32 hours (Yeti 400).Waterproof design is well suited to permanent installations.Monocrystalline solar panel.Rated to 50W, open circuit voltage is 18-20V.Solar port (blue, 8mm) is 14-22V, with up to 3.5A (50W max) output.Operating range is 0 to 40°C.Chainable up to 150W.
